member.name: DEF_SHARE_ID
member.summary: Values that specify the folder being acted on by methods of the interface.

member.name: DEF_SHARE_ID.DEFSHAREID_USERS
member.summary: The Users folder (FOLDERID_UserProfiles). This folder is usually found at C:\Users.

member.name: DEF_SHARE_ID.DEFSHAREID_PUBLIC
member.summary: The Public folder (FOLDERID_Public). This folder is usually found at C:\Users\Public.
